snippet: Speaker John A. Boehner claimed his own mandate with the re-election of a House Republican majority but expressed confidence that any deal he can reach with President Obama will get through the conservative House.
abstract: Speaker John A. Boehner claimed his own mandate with the re-election of a House Republican majority but expressed confidence that any deal he can reach with President Obama will get through the conservative House.

headline.main: Boehner Digs In on Opposition to Tax Hikes for Wealthy
